doc:
James Lee (screenwriter) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Lee_(screenwriter) 0 James Henderson Lee III (January 4, 1923 – July 2, 2002) was an American screenwriter. He is best known for writing several episodes of the 1977 TV miniseries Roots. James_Henderson_Lee_III ( January_4_,_1923 – July_2_,_2002 ) was an_American_screenwriter . He is_best_known for writing several_episodes of the_1977_TV_miniseries_Roots .
